$interpreted: Jerome: ...No trace of any monsters here
Fredrica: The monsters are heading south from the Alliance, and Atlas is the most southernmost point of the continent, so of course there aren't so many~
Lio: Is that it? I thought it might have been the Monster Enchantress of legend...
Jerome: ...Who told you that, Lio?
Lio: Oh, uh...
Lio: ...Sorry, I overheard the old guys in the kitchen talking about it.
Fredrica: Hmph~ Haven't the palace chefs got anything better to do? There's people starving outside, and they're still in the mood to gossip around~
Lio: It's my fault, I promised them I wouldn't say anything...
Fredrica: Relax, I don't have the time to chase after whichever officer's been leaking secrets right now.
Fredrica: All I can think about is that guy with the horns...
Fredrica: Oh come on~ Is this surprise just for us?
Demihuman Patrolman: What are humans doing in Atlas!? Scram!
Jerome: General!!
Demihuman Patrolman: Let me go! I'd sooner die than be at your mercy, the demihumans' pride—
Fredrica: Listen to him, there's no doubt he's one of the horned man's underlings~
Fredrica: Eh~ Can you tell your big sis here where your daddy's gone? We've got something ~private~ to discuss~
Demihuman Patrolman: What... what do you want with Nigel...!?
Fredrica: Hee~ You want me to tell you? You've got to keep it secret, it's quite delicate—
Jerome: ...General, Lio's listening.
Lio: Jerome, I can't see anything...
Yamitsuki: ...What are you doing?
Fredrica: Isn't the man with the horns here? I came from far and away to see him~
Jerome: Miss Yamitsuki, we've come on orders from Queen Angelia to see Nigel, leader of Atlas.
Jerome: Would you be able to report our arrival?
Yamitsuki: (...Before he left, Nigel said to keep his trip to the East secret from the Kingdom of the Sun...)
Yamitsuki: ...Nigel is preoccupied at the moment. I'm acting as his representative. Please state your business.
Fredrica: ...The horned man isn't—
Lio: Please! Won't you save us! Only Atlas can help us now!!
Yamitsuki: ...What does he mean?
Fredrica: ...You must have heard of the void that's opened in the East, and is now spewing monsters on a southward trail of destruction, right?
Yamitsuki: Mm, I know... Just like what happened in Atlas...
Fredrica: So, the Queen requests that Atlas open up its port again~
Fredrica: Even with all the demihumans returning, there must be more than enough empty houses here to take in a few refugees, and with room to spare?
Yamitsuki: The Kingdom of the Sun would have us... help take in refugees?
Jerome: Yes... This isn't an easy request to make. But the Desert Kingdom and Kingdom of the Sun have already come close to being paralyzed by the refugees...
Lio: Please!
Lio: Angelia rejected the Desert Queen's plea for help, but actually she's secretly been thinking of a way all along—
Fredrica: And so she thought of Atlas, and sent us here~
Yamitsuki: ...I see...
Yamitsuki: (...Letting in refugees would drag Atlas right into this. Not letting them in... would mean their lives...)
Yamitsuki: (...If Nigel were here, at least... What should I do...)
Leah: ...What's wrong? Can't you see I'm a demihuman too!
Lio: ...That voice, is that... Sis?

Model.Text: ...No trace of any monsters here

Is that it? I thought it might have been the Monster Enchantress of legend...

Please! Won't you save us! Only Atlas can help us now!!

...You must have heard of the void that's opened in the East, and is now spewing monsters on a southward trail of destruction, right?

So, the Queen requests that Atlas open up its port again~

The Kingdom of the Sun would have us... help take in refugees?
Yes... This isn't an easy request to make. But the Desert Kingdom and Kingdom of the Sun have already come close to being paralyzed by the refugees...
Please!
Angelia rejected the Desert Queen's plea for help, but actually she's secretly been thinking of a way all along—
And so she thought of Atlas, and sent us here~
...I see...
(...Letting in refugees would drag Atlas right into this. Not letting them in... would mean their lives...)
(...If Nigel were here, at least... What should I do...)
...What's wrong? Can't you see I'm a demihuman too!
...That voice, is that... Sis?
